message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CV 

This paper is about machine translation, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP). The paper specifically focuses on using document context to improve machine translation, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also uses Bayesian methods to model the translation process, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper uses beam search and reranking to improve the translation output, which are techniques commonly used in information retrieval (cs.IR) and computer vision (cs.CV).
